page.title: 17PEOPLES OPINIONS
page.content: {1.SHOPPING:}JUST OVER HALF THE PEOPLE THOUGHT THERE WAS A LACK OF SHOPS.MOST THOUGHT A CHAIN STORE WOULD BE A BENEFIT TO ARMADALE.PEOPLE HAD VIEWS THAT THERE WERE TOO MANY:SHOE, GROCER SHOPS AND CAFES. { 2.HOUSING:}MOST PEOPLE ALSO BORE COMPLAINTS ABOUT THEIR HOUSING: RENT,TOO HIGH,LACK OF SPACE AND UNACCEPTABLE REPAIRS.WHAT THEY DID ENJOY WAS THE COMFORT. { 3.VANDALISM:}CAUSES PEOPLE THOUGHT WERE:BOREDOM AND UNEMPLOYMENT.THE MOST COMMON TYPE OF VANDALISM WAS DESCRIBED AS DESTRUCTION. { 4.EDUCATION:}78% OF PEOPLE WERE IN FAVOUR OF THE BELT.1 HRS. HOMEWORK WAS SAID TO BE WANTED NIGHTLY FOR PUPILS. { 5.ENTERTAINMENT:}T.V. WAS THE MOST POPULAR SOURCE OF ENTERTAINMENT.OTHERS WERE SPORTS, BUT PEOPLE SAY THAT THERE ARE NOT ENOUGH THINGS FOR CHILDREN.
